definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: myrrh, or ‘ladanum’ (Gk.), an aromatic gum exuded by leaves of cistus-rose, cistus villosus, Tristr:FFP, 235, and esp. Nat. Hist. Bib., 458 ff.; Ri:HWB 897, cf. Löw:No. 79 Di:Ge 37:25 Now:Arch. i. 64 (Sab. [[לדן]], Sab. Denkm.:84; As. ladunu (fr. Damascus) cf. Schr:COT Ge 37:25, MBAk. 1881, pp. 413 ff.; Ar ladanun, whence Gk. lh/danon, la/danon Hdt:iii. 112);—[[וּחְרִי וׇלֽט נְכאׁת]] Ge 37:25, merchandise of Ishmaelite caravan, cf. Ge 43:11, present to Joseph (both J; LXX stakth/).
